definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
canvass for contributions/to recruit/to collect/to raise

sentences.english: That's going to change the rules about how to raise money.
sentences.chinese: 这将改变如何筹募资金的规则。

sentences.english: Then he began again his work of collecting.
sentences.chinese: 此后他重新开始筹募资金。

sentences.english: Today I took part in a benefit performance, collecting funds for children.
sentences.chinese: 今天参加一个为小孩筹募基金的义演。

sentences.english: They collect funds to finance the movement.
sentences.chinese: 他们为这一运动筹募基金。

sentences.english: She had raised more than twelve thousand dollars.
sentences.chinese: 她已经筹募了超过一万两千美元。

sentences.english: Our village is holding a fete to raise money for the building of the new hall.
sentences.chinese: 我们村里准备举行游艺会，以筹募经费建造礼堂。

sentences.english: To raise funds for the YBAM Penang SLC education & dharma propagation.
sentences.chinese: 筹募教育与弘法活动基金。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
